divs: Sighting Details my friend and i were going to my mothers ,home in meredith center, to hear gospel singers ,my son was in the back seat his age about 4-5 yrs old. we were coming down 93 south from ashland n.h, we see flashing lights to the right of us , many colors. a round shape at the time. some cars were pulled over looking,at it. if i remenber right it was dark. as i got to the new hampton exit on 93. and pulled off this thing was in front of me. hovering with alot of lights. a car pulled up behind us , and backed off fast went toward Bristol.we could see it so clear. it was really landing in front of us. my friend was yelling i want to see in the windows ,i was saying omg,omg, my son was in the back seat crying.then it was what i will call landing gear was coming down. there was like three i could see. i said no way im out of here and floored the car. but her and i both seem to remenber ,it seemed like when i pulled out .i was then on the north bound exit. i went under the overhead bridge she was yelling i want to see inside the windows. i pulled into the old gararge , at the time it was still there but now more of a boomerange,shape i run inside the garage asked the men to come out and see if im seeing what i am or crazy they came out, and were shocked saying what ta ..-- is that, my friend was already out of the car looking . there was a space between the garage and some trees. it turned on its side my god it was huge, made no sound what so ever,none and we could of reached out and touched it. had strange desinges on it. and lights. so huge with no sound at all. it went in back of the garage , and shot off, the men couldn;t beleave it we told them how it followed us down 93, we got into the car again heading down 104 to my parents in meredith center. . as we got down the road some, it came back beside us. and followed us to just in meredith center and shot across the road in front of us ((ole back road)) got to my moms told my dad he said take me out maybe we can see it again. i didn't want to see it again, but i took him. we didn;t see it. my mother had me call wlnh radio station and tell them. either they called the airforce or i did, i forgot now.. some reporter came to see us talked with us seperate including my son, and had us draw pictures of what we see. that week in the paper it read many others see the boomerange also, ( many others). in meredith. after that its as if we knew when they were around because we could go right to were we would see one for like maybe a few years after, and my friend and i both had some dreams the same. . there are times now i wish i had let someone hypnotisem me because of missing time, and also her and i having the same dreams , also knowing when they were around. of course people inour home town read about us in the paper, and made fun of us all the time. would make prank phone calls. to this day my son remenbers nothing about it. but her and i do and have, always wished we knew more if anything happened to us or not.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around September 22nd 1978
Summary: Like time lost.. many people see it , went to garage men inside came out to see it
